name: Radio-inactive
description:
Travel along T-Max's DNA using the up and down buttons on the right side of the screen and prevent him from turning into a chicken.

How to play:

 Get the most strategic upgrade at every level up and try to beat evolution with your trusty repairers. The game gets harder with every upgrade and you must find a way to resist evolving in this frantic micro-world to gain the most points!

The bar above T-Max shows how close to evolving he is. Don't let it fill!

Leave your high scores in the comment section!

Developers: 

Irmak Akyeli

Arda Özler

Special thanks to : Efe Mert Tokgöz

Sounds: freesound.org

T-rex model: https://www.cgtrader.com/items/2705681/download-page

Chicken model: https://www.turbosquid.com/3d-models/christmas-chicken-grey-art-3d-1266316#
